Title: Community Gallery Region 2024
Description:
A collection of 190 rooms (477 screens) submitted by 72 different people as part of the 2024 Leditor Month.

There are no region connections this time, but you play as a slugcat with many assists available to help you on your exploration, should you feel you need it. No rain cycle, no dying, just exploring. Use the map to see your exploration progress and unvisited rooms. You can fly the same way as Saint if absolutely necessary.

GitHub: https://github.com/alduris/gallery2024

If you are the creator of a room and you would like me to update the displayed name in the credit, contact @alduris on Discord.

Join the Rain World Modding Discord server: https://discord.gg/XaFKxegG6R
Authors:
HOSTED BY THE RAIN WORLD MODDING COMMUNITY 

Organized by Nautillo 

Region assembled by Alduris, Bro748, and Jevmen 

Code by Alduris and Isbjorn52 

Art and slugcat design by Beep
